pages.text: 98|8|unaka pratiphal unake paalanahaar kee or se sada rahane vaale baag hain. jinake neeche naharen bahatee hongee. ve unamen sada nivaas karenge. allaah unase prasann hua aur ve allaah se prasann hue. ye usake lie hai, jo apane paalanahaar se dara.
99|1|jab dharatee ko pooree tarah jhanjhod diya jaayega.
99|2|tatha bhoomi apane bojh baahar nikaal degee.
99|3|aur insaan kahega ki ise kya ho gaya
99|4|us din vah apanee sabhee soochanaayen varnan kar degee.
99|5|kyonki tere paalanahaar ne use yahee aadesh diya hai.
99|6|us din log titar-bitar hokar aayenge, taaki ve apane karmon ko dekh len.
99|7|to jisane ek kan ke baraabar bhee puny kiya hoga, use dekh lega.
99|8|aur jisane ek kan ke baraabar bhee bura kiya hoga, use dekh lega.
100|1|un ghodon kee shapath, jo daudakar haanph jaate hain
100|2|phir pattharon par taap maarakar chingaariyaan nikaalane vaalon kee shapath
100|3|phir praatah kaal mein dhaava bolane vaalon kee shapath
100|5|phir sena ke beech ghus jaate hain.
100|6|vaastav mein, insaan apane paalanahaar ka bada krtaghn (naashukara) hai.
100|7|nishchit roop se, vah isapar svayan saakshee (gavaah) hai.
100|9|kya vah us samay ko nahin jaanata, jab qabron mein jo kuchh hai, nikaal liya jaayega
